WorkItem.Description:
Excel2007 file xlsx, 
formula: =ROUNDDOWN(Games[[#This Row];[RRP LT, 21% PVM]]/1,21*0,85;2)
throws PHP Fatal error:  Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Games!J2 -> Formula Error: An unexpected error occured' in Classes/PHPExcel/Cell.php
Â 
PHPExcel doesn't seem to support [#This Row]
Release 1.7.4

Comments.Message: I have to confess that I've never seen an Excel formula that looked like that before. I even tried setting it in Excel itself, but Excel refused to accept it. Can you please provide a link to documentation on the use of [#This Row] and on syntax like [RRP LT, 21% PVM].

It seems that it is a named table. 

I have found description of how it is done here:
http://www.jkp-ads.com/articles/Excel2007tables.asp
I have never seen this before either, just got an Excel file for import.
